short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a timer to each player that keeps track of the total amount of time that player has taken during their turns during a game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SpellTable Total Turn Timer adds a timer to each player to keep track of the total amount of time that player has taken during their turns during a game. SpellTable currently only tracks the current turn's time.
